item.title: Antisemitism 101
item.description: Antisemitism is horrible. As with any discrimination, it taps into the worst corner of the human psyche â€“ the dark feeling of control which flickers within a person when they abuse another simply because they are different or unfamiliar. Whilst Wiley was enjoying such crude empowerment when he spent over 12 hours last week bombarding social media with his antisemitic posts, Jewish people all over the world including myself were left bruised.
